benchmark_details.name: Graph Topic Model (GTM)
benchmark_details.overview: GTM is a neural topic model that incorporates document relationship graph to enrich document and word representations.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To introduce a GNN-based neural topic model that enhances document representations using document relationship graphs.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on topic coherence measures related to word co-occurrence statistics.
methodology.interpretation: Higher topic coherence scores indicate better performance in topic modeling.
methodology.baseline_results: GTM outperformed all baseline models (LDA, NVDM, ProdLDA, GraphBTM, ATM, W-LDA) across datasets.
methodology.validation: Extensive experiments conducted on three datasets.
